hadiths.text: It was narrated that Abu Hurairah said:"The Messenger of Allah said: 'Allah, the Mighty and Sublime, has forgiven my Ummah for what is whispered to them or what enters their minds, so long as they do not act upon it or speak of it

chapter.eng-name: The One Who Utters A Divorce To Himself (Without Uttering The Words Loudly)
